title: spaceai
author: spaceai
content: Space AI Finance - Bridging CeFi and DeFi for the Future of Finance!   Official Website||Whitepaper||ExplorerWelcome to the future of finance! The SPACE AI project aims to bridge the gap between centralized finance (CeFi) and decentralized finance (DeFi) through the innovative concept of CeDeFi. Discover a smart, secure financial platform that offers seamless liquidity for trading cryptocurrencies, NFTs, and other assets, all in one user-friendly interface.Features❇️ Launch Break Technology❇️ SpaceAI Ecosystem AI Swap, SpEarn ❇️ AI Liquidity and AI Bridge❇️ SpaceLaunch: Launchpad, Lock LP token❇️ SpNFT: NFT Marketplace❇️ AI info: market information, retrieve GPT price forecast❇️ SpPay: Payment, OTC, P2P❇️ SpCefi: Spot, margin, futures, options, perpetual swaps, lending and mining services.Space AI Finance MainnetWe are developing a new blockchain and token called SpAI on which the entire ecosystem of Space AI Finance will operate. Depending on the government's decision and the chain's architecture, we will build either a layer 1 or layer 2 blockchain.❇️ Consensus Algorithm: Our blockchain will utilize advanced consensus algorithms like PoS, DPoS, PoH, PoB, and ZK. The choice will depend on scalability and security needs.❇️ Smart Contracts: SpaceAI Finance smart contracts are user-friendly and require no new programming languages, making contract creation simple.❇️ Native Tokens/Coins: The blockchain will have 10,000,000,000 SpaceAI Finance coins, serving as the primary digital asset for reduced trading fees on our exchange.❇️ Security Tokens: Our DEX supports P2P trading of security tokens, offering companies an efficient fundraising platform based on market demand.Platform Features and Support❇️ Anti-Fraud Labeling System: In case of a hacked account, users can label their addresses to prevent transactions from being processed by exchanges and traders.❇️ Cryptocurrency Fiat Gateway: Our gateway supports various cryptocurrencies, allowing users to make anonymous payments without disclosing their identities.❇️ Multilingual Support: Initially supporting English, Chinese, and Vietnamese, additional languages will be added later.❇️ Apps: Our platform offers web, Android, and iOS versions for convenient access on different devices.❇️ Support: Users receive comprehensive support through documentation, a helpdesk, ticketing, and an FAQ section.Token Allocation Breakdown:✅ 50%: Public Sale✅ 20%: Team and Advisors✅ 15%: Development and Operations✅ 10%: Marketing and Partnerships✅ 5%: Community Rewards✅ Official website:: https://spaceai.finance/Follow Us on Social MediaTwitter—Discord—Telegram—Medium
